name: Alloka
overview:
Alloka is simple but accurate inbound calls counter for any website.

It is web-based, no-install and easy-to-start calltracking service that lets you know everything about phone callers:

  • How many and what quality calls does your site bring to you.
  • Which marketing channel, Facebook, Google Adwords or… whatever, works for you and which doesnâ€™t.
  • Which site pages are hot, bring you maximum calls.
  • Which search engine keywords give you maximum calls.
  • Which referrals work to generate calls.

We are eager to take place in heads of internet marketing managers like website clicks analytics (e.g. Google Analytics) did some years ago.

Everyone gathers statistics about site visitors, why nobody cares about callers?

In our vision it is much more important to analyze calls than just clicks. Clicks are not something that business really needs.

Business needs calls and orders, so take Alloka and track them.
